sentences.en: Banks and building societies are competing fiercely for business.
sentences.cn: 银行和购房互助协会为了争夺业务而展开激烈的竞争。

sentences.en: Competing warlords and foreign powers scrambled for political spoils.
sentences.cn: 相互争斗的军阀及外国列强们正在争夺政治上的收益。

sentences.en: For some people, competing is the be-all and end-all of their running.
sentences.cn: 对于有些人来说，赛跑的全部意义就是竞争。

sentences.en: He will be competing in the London-Calais-London race.
sentences.cn: 他将参加伦敦至加来的航海往返赛。

sentences.en: I went on competing till I was in my middle forties.
sentences.cn: 我继续参赛，直到45岁左右。

sentences.en: John was competing against James for the prize in arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 约翰和詹姆斯比赛争夺算术奖.

sentences.en: Many companies continued to grow by merging with or buying competing firms.
sentences.cn: 许多公司通过合并或收买竞争对手的公司而不断扩大.

sentences.en: Marx produced a new theory about historical change based upon conflict between competing groups.
sentences.cn: 马克思创立了一种新理论，认为历史的演变是基于对立集团之间的冲突之上的。

sentences.en: Several companies are competing for the contract.
sentences.cn: 为得到那项合同，几家公司正在竞争。

sentences.en: Several companies are competing for the contract.
sentences.cn: 几家公司正为争取一项合同而互相竞争。

sentences.en: Several people gave competing accounts of the accident.
sentences.cn: 几个人对这一事件的说法互相矛盾。

sentences.en: The market for which they are competing is still unformed.
sentences.cn: 他们角逐的市场尚未成形。

sentences.en: The Olympic Games began with a parade of all the competing nations.
sentences.cn: 奥运会以所有参赛国列队进场开始.

sentences.en: The polytechnics have hitherto been at an unfair disadvantage in competing for pupils and money.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，理工专科学校在争取生源和资金方面一直处于劣势。

sentences.en: The stores will inevitably end up competing with each other in their push for increased market shares.
sentences.cn: 在努力争取更大的市场份额的过程中，这些商场最终将不可避免地相互展开竞争。

sentences.en: They talked about the competing theories of the origin of life.
sentences.cn: 他们讨论了几种相互矛盾的生命起源理论。

words.tran_cn: 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

trans.tran_cn: 对抗的，竞争的，相互矛盾的
